data.system_settings: iMac (Retina 4K, 21.5-inch, Late 2015), OS X El Capitan 10.11.6 (15G1421)
data.actual_result: The tab has the title of the text-channel you were on
data.expected_result: It shouldn't show the name of the text-channel that you were previously on
data.short_description: Browser Tab shows last text-channel that was open after you log out
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a text-channel - See that tab title is name of text-channel - log out - see title of tab
